cooldown.description:
A app free version hian darkar khatah interview pakhat a la thei a ni.

I duh chuan a tihkhawtlai te chu paih chhuah i duh a, ads te chu paih chhuah a, interview apianga tihchangtlun dan tur thurawn nen feedback report i dawng duh a nih chuan premium subscribing ngaihtuah rawh.

Cooldowns te paih chhuah te, ads te paih chhuah te, leh interview apianga tihchangtlun dan tur thurawn te nena feedback report dawng duh tan chuan premium subscribing ngaihtuah rawh.

store.short_description: He AI simulator tak tak hmanga hna interview i neih leh tur atan practice rawh.
store.full_description:
Job interview lak hian i rilru a ti na a, i lungkham em?
Hna interview la turin inpeih lo takin i la inhria mai thei em?
Hei hi job interview setting-a i conversational skills practice na tur app tha ber a ni!

Job IntelliViewer chuan artificial intelligence thiltihtheihna hmangin mock job interview tak tak a nei a, chu chuan conversational skills mamawh chu nun tak tak recruiter-te chungah impression tha tak siam turin a pui thei che a, i interview leh tur ace turin i inpeih theih nan a pui ang che.

Interview-te hi i hnathawh tur dinhmun ang zela siam a ni a, hna interview tak tak aiawh tha zawk tura i thil tum nena inzawm zawhnate nen a siam leh siamrem a ni ang.

Premium hmangtute chuan interview tin tawp lamah report an dawng bawk ang a, chu chu inbiakna chu feedback leh hna tak tak i hmuh theihna tur advice nen a sawifiah ang.
